                                       android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Helper method to set the background to a view, depending on the android version.
        Parameters:
        view - the view to apply the drawable
        drawable - drawable object
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • setBackgroundCompat

        public static void setBackgroundCompat(android.view.View view,
                                       @DrawableRes
                                       int drawableRes)
        Helper method to set the background to a view, depending on the android version
        Parameters:
        view - the view to apply the drawable
        drawableRes - drawable resource id
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • setBackgroundCompat

        public static void setBackgroundCompat(android.view.View view,
                                       @ColorRes
                                       int normalColorRes,
                                       @ColorRes
                                       int pressedColorRes,
                                       @ColorRes
                                       int rippleColorRes)
        Ultra compat method to set the background to a view, providing color resource identifiers.

        Note: If you already have the color in Integer format, please obtain the Drawable object from getSelectableBackgroundCompat(int, int, int) and set it into setBackgroundCompat(View, Drawable).

        Parameters:
        view - the view interested at the background
        normalColorRes - the color resource id
        pressedColorRes - the pressed color resource id
        rippleColorRes - the ripple color resource id
        Since:
        1.0.0-b5

      • getDrawableCompat

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDrawableCompat(android.content.Context context,
                                                                   @DrawableRes
                                                                   int drawableRes)
        Helper method to get the drawable by its resource. Specific to the correct android version.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        drawableRes - drawable resource id
        Returns:
        the drawable object
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • getSelectableItemBackground

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getSelectableItemBackground(android.content.Context context)
        Helper method to get the system (or overridden) default selectableItemBackground Drawable. Returns the R.attr.selectableItemBackground of the style attribute.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        Default selectable item background drawable
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • getColorControlHighlight

        public static int getColorControlHighlight(android.content.Context context)
        Helper method to get the system (or overridden) default colorControlHighlight. Returns the color of the R.attr.colorControlHighlight of the style attribute.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        Default Color Control Highlight
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • getSelectableBackgroundCompat

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getSelectableBackgroundCompat(int normalColor,
                                                                               int pressedColor,
                                                                               int rippleColor)
        Helper method to get a custom selectable background with Ripple color, if device has at least Lollipop.
        Parameters:
        normalColor - the color in normal state
        pressedColor - the pressed color
        rippleColor - the color of the ripple
        Returns:
        the RippleDrawable with StateListDrawable if at least Lollipop, the normal StateListDrawable otherwise
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

      • getRippleDrawable

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getRippleDrawable(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable,
                                                                   int rippleColor)
        Adds a ripple effect to any Drawable background.
        Parameters:
        drawable - any background drawable
        rippleColor - the color of the ripple
        Returns:
        the RippleDrawable with the chosen background drawable if at least Lollipop, the provided drawable otherwise
        Since:
        1.0.0-b1

        private static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getRippleMask(int color)
